xsens::SharedData Class Reference

 The atomic reference count value.
 

Protected Member Functions

 SharedData ()
 Constructor, initializes the reference count to 0.
 
 SharedData (const SharedData &)
 Copy constructor, initializes the reference count to 0 since the copy is a new object. More...
 

Detailed Description

Base class for shared operations.

This class is a required base class when using shared pointers, since it provides the reference counter.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

xsens::SharedData::SharedData ( const SharedData &  )
inlineprotected

Copy constructor, initializes the reference count to 0 since the copy is a new object.

Note
This function is not publicly accessible, since the inheriting class should specify its own copying
